    In-depth use of ScrubletR Implementing Scrublet in R
  • Changelog

version 0.2.0

scrubletR is a native R implementation of the original. We feel that the R implentation provides sufficiently similar results to the Python but there are small differences. Please read this to learn more. To read more about the original work, please read the paper:

Wolock SL, Lopez R, Klein AM. Scrublet: Computational Identification of Cell Doublets in Single-Cell Transcriptomic Data. Cell Syst. 2019 Apr 24;8(4):281-291.e9. doi: 10.1016/j.cels.2018.11.005. Epub 2019 Apr 3. PMID: 30954476; PMCID: PMC6625319. linked here

Visit HowTo for quick start
